amendment.description: Amendment requires States, as a prerequisite for obtaining funds, to submit a plan with the Department of Justice detailing the process by which parents will be notified when a convicted juvenile sex offender is enrolled in a school system.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require states, as a prerequisite for obtaining Byrne Grant funds, to submit a plan with the Department of Justice detailing the process by which parents of a school district would be notified if a convicted juvenile sex offender is enrolled in the local elementary or secondary school.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dunn amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 398 - 21 (Roll no. 116).
